Definition:
A type of prescription drug or over-the-counter drug that is used to prevent, treat, or relieve symptoms of a disease or abnormal condition, but excluding vaccines.
In FHIR DSTU2 and STU3, Medication lacks the identifer attribute, which is included in SHR as an extension.
DSTU2 lacks the status attribute, which is required by US-Core.
Batch is 0..1 in FHIR R4, and accordingly is restricted here.
unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.

Short: identifies the meaning of the extension
Definition: Source of the definition for the extension code - a logical name or a URL.
Value of extension - may be a resource or one of a constrained set of the data types (see Extensibility in the spec for list).
